tool.name: NeMo Curator
tool.description: Scalable data curation library for training large language models

AddId.description: The module responsible for adding unique IDs to each document record.

AegisClassifier.description: NVIDIA's AEGIS safety classifier is a LLM content safety model.

AlphaFilter.description: This filter tries to identify files that have large tensors, or tables stored as raw text within code files.

ArxivDownloadExtractStage.description: Composite stage for downloading and processing Arxiv data.

AudioToDocumentStage.description: Stage to conver DocumentObject to DocumentBatch

BoilerPlateStringFilter.description: If more than 40% of paragraphs contain boilerplate strings, then discard.

BoilerPlateStringModifier.description: If the sentence contains any of the boilerplate strings then discard.

BucketsToEdgesStage.description: Stage that takes in a file consiting of LSH bucket ids and document ids belonging to the bucket and outputs a file consisting of edges between documents with the same bucket id.

BulletsFilter.description: If more than 90% of the lines start with a bullet, then discard.

CaptionEnhancementStage.description: Stage that enhances video captions using language models.

CaptionGenerationStage.description: Stage that generates captions for video windows using specified VL model.

CaptionPreparationStage.description: Stage that prepares captions for video processing.

ClassifierModelStage.description: Stage for Hugging Face model inference.

ClipAestheticFilterStage.description: Stage for filtering video clips based on CLIP aesthetic score.

ClipFrameExtractionStage.description: Stage for extracting frames from video clips.

ClipTranscodingStage.description: Stage that transcodes video clips into a standardized format.

ClipWriterStage.description: Stage that writes clips and metadata for clip transcoding.

ClusterWiseFilePartitioningStage.description: Stage that partitions input files into PairwiseFileGroupTasks for deduplication.

CommonCrawlDownloadExtractStage.description: Composite stage for downloading and processing Common Crawl data.

CommonEnglishWordsFilter.description: If the sentence contains at least 2 common English words, then keep it.

ContentTypeClassifier.description: ContentTypeClassifier is a text classification model designed to categorize documents into one of 11 distinct speech types based on their content.

CosmosEmbed1EmbeddingStage.description: Stage for embedding Cosmos-Embed1 frames into a vector space.

CosmosEmbed1FrameCreationStage.description: Stage for creating Cosmos-Embed1 input frames from video clips.

DistributedDataClassifier.description: Base composite stage for distributed data classification.

DocumentDownloadExtractStage.description: Composite stage that combines URL generation, download, iterate, and extract stages.

DocumentDownloadStage.description: Stage that downloads files from URLs to local storage.

DocumentExtractStage.description: Stage that extracts structured content from raw records.

DocumentFilter.description: An abstract base class for text-based document filters.

DocumentIterateStage.description: Stage that iterates through downloaded files and extracts records.

DocumentJoiner.description: Joins documents that have a common id back into a single document.

DocumentModifier.description: Abstract base class for text-based document modifiers.

DocumentSplitter.description: Splits documents into segments based on a separator.

DomainClassifier.description: DomainClassifier is a specialized classifier designed for English text domain classification tasks, utilizing the NemoCurator Domain Classifier (https://huggingface.co/nvidia/domain-classifier) model.

EllipsisFilter.description: If more than 30% of the sentences end with an elipsis, then discard.

EmbeddingModelStage.description: HuggingFace model stage that produces embeddings with pooling.

ExactDeduplicationWorkflow.description: A pipeline that performs exact deduplication of a dataset.

Filter.description: The module responsible for filtering records based on a metadata field.

FineWebEduClassifier.description: FineWebEduClassifier is a specialized classifier designed for educational content assessment, utilizing the Hugging Face FineWeb EDU Classifier model (https://huggingface.co/HuggingFaceFW/fineweb-edu-classifier).

FineWebMixtralEduClassifier.description: FineWebMixtralEduClassifier is a specialized classifier designed for educational content assessment, utilizing the NemoCurator FineWeb Mixtral Edu Classifier model (https://huggingface.co/nvidia/nemocurator-fineweb-mixtral-edu-classifier).

FineWebModelStage.description: Stage for Hugging Face model inference.

FineWebNemotronEduClassifier.description: FineWebNemotronEduClassifier is a specialized classifier designed for educational content assessment, utilizing the NemoCurator FineWeb Nemotron-4 Edu Classifier model (https://huggingface.co/nvidia/nemocurator-fineweb-nemotron-4-edu-classifier).

FixedStrideExtractorStage.description: Stage that extracts video clips using fixed-length intervals.

FormatAegisPromptStage.description: FormatAegisPromptStage is a stage that truncates and wraps the input text in a prompt for the AEGIS model.

FuzzyDeduplicationWorkflow.description: A pipeline that performs fuzzy deduplication of a dataset.

GetPairwiseWerStage.description: Count pairwise word-error-rate (WER) * 100% for each pair of text and pred_text.

HTMLBoilerplateFilter.description: This filter tries to identify HTML that is largely boilerplate.

HistogramFilter.description: Histogram filter used by the NLLB paper (https://arxiv.org/pdf/2207.04672).

IdentifyDuplicatesStage.description: Stage that generates removal IDs for fuzzy deduplication.

ImageAestheticFilterStage.description: Stage for filtering out images based on aesthetic scores.

ImageDuplicatesRemovalStage.description: Filter stage that removes images whose IDs appear in a Parquet file.

ImageEmbeddingStage.description: Stage for generating image embeddings using CLIP model.

ImageNSFWFilterStage.description: Stage for filtering out NSFW images using NSFWScorer model.

ImageReaderStage.description: DALI-based reader that loads images from WebDataset tar shards.

ImageWriterStage.description: Write images to tar files and corresponding metadata to a Parquet file.

InferenceAsrNemoStage.description: Stage that do speech recognition inference using NeMo model.

InstructionDataGuardClassifier.description: Instruction Data Guard is a classification model designed to detect LLM poisoning trigger attacks.

InternVideo2EmbeddingStage.description: Stage for generating embeddings from InternVideo2 input frames.

InternVideo2FrameCreationStage.description: Stage for creating InternVideo2 input frames from video clips.

JsonlReader.description: Composite stage for reading JSONL files.

JsonlReaderStage.description: Stage that processes a group of JSONL files into a DocumentBatch.

JsonlWriter.description: Writer that writes a DocumentBatch to a JSONL file.

KMeansReadFitWriteStage.description: KMeans clustering stage that requires RAFT for distributed processing.

KMeansStage.description: KMeans clustering stage that requires RAFT for distributed processing.

LSHStage.description: Stage that performs LSH on a FileGroupTask containing minhash data.

LongWordFilter.description: If the document contains a word longer than 1000 characters, then discard.

MeanWordLengthFilter.description: If the mean word length is not in a specified range, then discard.

MegatronTokenizerWriter.description: Writer that writes a DocumentBatch to Megatron ready tokenized files.

MinHashStage.description: ProcessingStage for computing MinHash signatures on documents for fuzzy deduplication.

MotionFilterStage.description: Stage for filtering video clips based on motion score.

MotionVectorDecodeStage.description: Stage for decoding motion vector information from video files.

MultilingualDomainClassifier.description: MultilingualDomainClassifier is a specialized classifier designed for domain classification tasks, utilizing the NemoCurator Multilingual Domain Classifier (https://huggingface.co/nvidia/multilingual-domain-classifier) model.

NonAlphaNumericFilter.description: If more than 25% of the document is non-alphanumeric, then discard.

NumbersFilter.description: If more than 15% of the document contains numbers, then discard.

PairwiseCosineSimilarityStage.description: Pairwise cosine similarity stage that computes similarity within clusters.

PairwiseStage.description: Pairwise similarity stage for semantic deduplication.

ParenthesesFilter.description: If more than 10% of the sentence is in parentheses, then discard.

ParquetReader.description: Composite stage for reading Parquet files.

ParquetReaderStage.description: Stage that processes a group of Parquet files into a DocumentBatch.

ParquetWriter.description: Writer that writes a DocumentBatch to a Parquet file using pandas.

PerExtensionFilter.description: This filter that has specific conditions depending on the file extension.

PornographicUrlsFilter.description: Check if any of the URLs within the document point to pornography.

PostProcessAegisResponsesStage.description: PostProcessAegisResponsesStage is a stage that post-processes the responses from the AEGIS model.

PreviewStage.description: Stage that generates webp previews from video clips.

PromptTaskComplexityClassifier.description: PromptTaskComplexityClassifier is a multi-headed model which classifies English text prompts across task types and complexity dimensions.

PromptTaskComplexityModelStage.description: Stage for Hugging Face model inference.

PunctuationFilter.description: If more than 85% of the sentences do not end with a punctuation mark, then discard.

QualityClassifier.description: QualityClassifier is a specialized classifier designed for quality assessment tasks, utilizing the NemoCurator Quality Classifier DeBERTa model (https://huggingface.co/nvidia/quality-classifier-deberta).

RepeatedLinesByCharFilter.description: If the document shrinks by > 20% in terms of number of lines after removing duplicate lines, then discard.

RepeatedLinesFilter.description: If the document shrinks by > 30% in terms of number of lines after removing duplicate lines, then discard.

RepeatedParagraphsByCharFilter.description: If the document shrinks by > 10% in terms of number of lines after removing duplicate paragraphs, then discard.

RepeatedParagraphsFilter.description: If the document shrinks by > 30% in terms of number of lines after removing duplicate paragraphs, then discard.

RepeatingDuplicateNGramsFilter.description: If the document shrinks by > x% in terms of number of characters after removing all duplicate n-grams, then discard.

RepeatingTopNGramsFilter.description: If the document shrinks by > x% in terms of number of characters after removing the top n-grams, then discard.

Score.description: The module responsible for adding metadata to records based on statistics about the text.

ScoreFilter.description: The module responsible for applying a filter (or chain of filters) to all documents in a dataset.

SubstringFilter.description: Keeps documents that contain a substring in a given position.

SymbolsToWordsFilter.description: Remove any document with a symbol-to-word ratio greater than 0.1 for either the hash symbol or the elipsis.

TokenCountFilter.description: If the document contains more or less than a specified number of tokens, then discard.

TransNetV2ClipExtractionStage.description: Stage for extracting video clips using TransNetV2.

URLGenerationStage.description: Stage that generates URLs from minimal input parameters.

UrlsFilter.description: If more than 20% of the document is comprised of URLs, then discard.

VideoFrameExtractionStage.description: Stage that extracts frames from videos into numpy arrays.

VideoReader.description: Composite stage that reads video files from storage and downloads/processes them.

VideoReaderStage.description: Stage that reads video files from local filesystem and extracts metadata.

WhiteSpaceFilter.description: If the document contains a significant number of white space characters, then discard.

WikipediaDownloadExtractStage.description: Composite stage for downloading and processing Wikipedia data.

WordCountFilter.description: If a document contains a number of words not within a specified range, then discard.

hints.purpose: Remove very short or very long documents
hints.when_to_use: Early in pipeline to reduce data volume

WordsWithoutAlphabetsFilter.description: 80% of words in a document must contain at least one alphabetic character.

XMLHeaderFilter.description: This filter tries to identify files that have incorrect file extensions.
